WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is due to step in value of haste as result of 2T10 interaction. Check http://elitistjerks.com/f75/t37825-rawr_mage/p40/#post1505632 for discussion of the effect.
WorkItem.Description:
Switching between a 12 sp / 10 haste gem and a 20 haste gem in a yellow slot leads to over 100 DPS difference?
 
I'm perfectly willing to accept that maybe I'm not thinking of some reason why this would be accurate - but I definitely can't come up with such a scenario.
 
Profile attached - swap between the two gems in my belt and you should see the same effect.
